Detailed Description

Format class.

This class is used for basic input formating.

License:
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
Link:
http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework

Member Function Documentation

static Boo_Format::format ( $  value,
$  formatRule 
) [static]

Formats a value.

Use # in the format rule to represent the value.

Parameters:
string $value The value to format.
string $formatRule The format rule.
Returns:
mixed The value if format was successful, FALSE otherwise.

static Boo_Format::formatExpDate ( $  expDate,
$  format = 0 
) [static]

Formats expiration date.

Expiration date can be in the following formats:

  • MMYY
  • MM/YY
  • MM-YY
  • MMYYYY
  • MM/YYYY
  • MM-YYYY
  • YYYY-MM-DD
  • YYYY/MM/DD

Possible formats are:

  • 0 = MMDD
Parameters:
string $expDate The expiration date.
int $format[optional] The format.
Todo:
Add support for other formats.
Returns:
string Formated expiration date on success, FALSE on failure.

Formats phone number.

Parameters:

int $format[optional] The format.

Possible formats are:

  • 0 = 8003682669
  • 1 = 800-368-2669
  • 2 = (800) 368-2669
  • 3 = 800.368.2669
